section.title: In Place Editing
section.subtitle: What is in place editing?
section.para: In place editing consist of editing text or media without going to an edit page. The content that is statically seen within a website can be edited and saved with a simple click.
InPlaceEditing is simply a model that uses a storage adapter and an editor to do its bidding. It listens for post values that aims any editable content into an application.
MajistiX' in place editing extension consists of two parts: editors and storage adapters.
